title: 5 20min q
body: Riot are u fcking serious. Your going to make be wait becaue ur sht client wont load my game. U wonder why half the people quit league, I come home from a long day of school and now i have to wait 20 min q. I love the game but u pentalizing me on ur mistakes. Thats fcked up. ðŸ’¯

replies.body: i would also suggest a bit more respect. even if its a problem that moves you emotional there is no "riot" you can blame for this, only people who work for riot which you can ASK for help with this topic. mind your choice of words please, they try their best do deliver us a satisfying game.

sorry for playing on a better server than you.
how many worlds did you won again ?
It's cool i got a life so lol is for fun. I have won zero worlds but i never heard of u winning any worlds. Who are u again? Exactly.

You'll never get a 5-game low-priority queue for a single match. It takes a trend of disconnections before you end up with a 5-game penalty.

If you can give me a more detailed explanation of what issues you're experiencing with the game, I can assist you in troubleshooting it.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/L9Enx9d0-leaverbuster-given-in-error

The same problem is happening to a lot of people the link above is more descriptive. Same exact problem.

In this case, there may be problems with your local network settings that prevent a good connection from being established. I recommend workling through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure everything is good.

Let me know if you have any other issues with this.
Also i haven't left a game in so long
